name: growling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A growling sound is long, low, and rough, like the threatening sound made by a dog: The car made a low growling sound. They mocked his growling, guttural speech. Related word
growl
More examplesFewer examplesThe growling noise of the planes never stops.There was an angry growling sound, almost like a dog. He spoke in a growling monotone. His vocals ranged from a growling baritone to a falsetto.Eerie, growling basslines were overlaid with spectral female vocals. The orchestra's menacing rhythms and growling, low notes captured the sense of absolute terror.
